CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.11b, drugindication (250AN)
E2B (R3): G.k.7.r.1 Indication as Reported by the Primary Source Conformance: Optional Data Type: 250AN OID: None Value Allowed: Free text nullFlavor: ASKU, NASK, UNK
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The indication as reported. For multiple indications for the same drug, repeat the entire drug entry, specifying the same drug for each indication.
CustomField.label: Indication for Use in the Case
